title: Homemade Tomato Sauce
description: Fresh, flavorful tomato sauce perfect for pasta
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: If using fresh tomatoes, blanch, peel, and chop them.
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Saut√© onions until translucent, about 5 minutes.
